Themify Icons

A complete set of 320+ icons inspired by iOS 7 style icons.

Using Themify Icons

To use an icon, simply use the icon class on an <i> tag:

<i class="ti-heart"></i>
Result
Icon Sizes

Control icon size using font-size or transform scale:

1rem
1.5rem
2rem
3rem
